articles.author: Maria Sacchetti, Adam Taylor, Marianne LeVine, Dan Lamothe
articles.title: Lawyers scramble to prevent Trump from deporting migrants to Libya - The Washington Post
articles.description: A court filing says the U.S. is preparing to deport people from Southeast Asia to Libya, a troubled nation “notorious for its human rights violations.”
articles.content: Lawyers representing a number of immigrants asked a federal judge on Wednesday to urgently block the Trump administration from deporting a group of people to Libya, Saudi Arabia or any other country … [+4857 chars]

articles.author: Jess Thomson
articles.title: Scientists edge closer to solving mystery of T. rex origins - Live Science
articles.description: T. rex was previously suspected to have evolved in Asia and migrated to North America, but new research shows that the direct ancestors of this iconic dinosaur may have been the one to make the journey instead.
articles.content:
The famed Tyrannosaurus rex may have evolved in a very different location from its direct ancestors, new research finds.
The new study builds on earlier research, which suggested that T. rex's ances… [+5756 chars]
